text: Fully Renovated 5-Bed, 4-Bath Townhome Prime Location with High Investment Potential This beautifully renovated townhome offers 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms across 1, 428 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. With a spacious, open-concept layout and abundant natural light, the home is ideal for multi-generational living, co-living, or strong rental income potential. Recent upgrades include brand-new flooring, a modern kitchen with updated appliances, and freshly painted interiorsmove-in ready for homeowners or tenants alike. Located within walking distance to top-rated schools, shopping, dining, and public transportation, this property combines everyday convenience with excellent long-term value. Whether youre an investor or a savvy buyer, this is a rare opportunity to own a high-yield asset in a sought-after neighborhood.

text: Most affordable 3 bedroom, single family in all of Alhambra!!! This beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers a perfect blend of modern upgrades and timeless design. Every detail of this property has been carefully updated to provide comfort, style, and peace of mind. The home has been re-wired and re-piped, ensuring efficiency and reliability for years to come. The kitchen has been upgraded with sleek white shaker cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, and stainless-steel appliances. Its open layout flows seamlessly into the dining and living areas. Both bathrooms have been beautifully redesigned with high-end finishes. The master bathroom features a modern walk-in shower with chic subway tiles and black hardware, while the secondary bathroom offers a pristine shower/tub combo, catering to both style and functionality. Throughout the home, brand-new vinyl windows invite in an abundance of natural light, highlighting the warm lvp flooring that ties the space together. This property is ready for you to call it home! If youre looking for a modernized home with timeless appeal in Alhambra, 802 S Olive Ave is ready to welcome you.

text: Step into timeless elegance with this beautifully maintained California Craftsman-style home, nestled in one of Alhambras most sought-after neighborhoods near South Pasadena and San Marino. From the moment you arrive, youre welcomed by a lush, manicured front yard bursting with vibrant flowering plants and mature shrubbery setting the tone for the warmth and character that await inside. A charming front porch leads into a traditional interior rich with architectural detail. The living room features original hardwood floors, a brick fireplace with a classic mantle, and custom built-in bookshelves that flow seamlessly into the adjacent dining room, complete with wainscoting and a stunning built-in china cabinet with leaded glass. The full bathroom offers a tub/shower combo with a glass enclosure, vintage tile accents, and a single-sink vanity. The spacious primary bedroom includes a private half bath and a generous cedar-lined walk-in closet, while the second bedroom also features its own cedar-lined walk-in. Additional built-in hallway cabinetry provides extra storage. The kitchen retains its vintage charm with tile countertops and classic cabinetry, and an adjacent laundry room offers even more storage. Dual-pane windows, along with central heating and air conditioning, ensure year-round comfort. Step outside to an expansive backyard oasis featuring a large concrete pad, a detached two-car garage, and an enormous grassy area with planters and walkways perfect for entertaining, gardening, or future ADU potential. The garage is equipped with its own electrical panel, water and gas hookups, utility sink, built-in cabinetry, and a workbench ideal for a workshop or potential conversion.

text: Beloved cottage nestled in the desirable Shorb Street Historic Neighborhood! Owned by the same family for decades, this home radiates warmth, character and a true sense of place. Bathed in natural light, the open living areas invite you to linger and enjoy the easy flow between spaces. The kitchen features a sunny dining area and access to a service porch with laundry area. Two bedrooms share a convenient bath off the hall. The private backyard has a patio area and access to a bonus studio space. Conveniently located to shopping, freeways and everything Alhambra has to offer. A home that is not just a place to live; it is a place with a story - waiting for the next chapter to begin.

text: Conveniently situated within easy reach of shopping and public transportation, this charming 2 bedrooms, 1 bath home with an attached 1-car garage offers both comfort and accessibility. Step through the front door into a cozy living room, seamlessly connected to the adjacent dining area - a perfect space for relaxing or entertaining guests. The hallway leads to two bedrooms, positioned on either side, with a full bathroom conveniently located in between. The bathroom features dual sinks and a tub, offering both function and comfort. The kitchen includes built-in cabinetry for ample storage, stove and the adjacent laundry room provides washer/dryer hookups and direct access to the garage. The compact backyard provides a private outdoor space - perfect for a morning coffee, light gardening, or simply unwinding at the end of the day. This is a Trust sale with the property being sold as is .

text: Back on the Market! Investment opportunity located in Alhambra! This investment property boasts 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, and 2, 393 SqFt of living space. The upstairs rental unit that is currently active on Air BnB and averages $1, 875 per month. The downstairs studio is on Air BnB as well, averaging $1, 550 per month. The main home has 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. The home was split into 3 separate living areas, all with their own individual entrances. The first floor (main house), has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom, a living room, dining area, kitchen, breakfast and a laundry area. Behind the main house is an attached studio w/ bath. The second level has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The detached (original), garage was converted into an ADU (under prior ownership), with 333-SqFt of living space, a kitchen area and 1 bathroom, it also has its own private entrance. The backyard features a concrete patio and a pool, ideal for spring and summer enjoyment and attracting potential tenants. The 2-car garage is behind the ADU, with the entrance towards alley. This property presents a promising investment opportunity.

text: Welcome to this beautifully renovated single-family home that perfectly blends modern minimalism with mid-century charm. Located in one of Alhambra's most sought-after neighborhoods with great schools. Perched on a hill, this bright and spacious 3-bedroom, 2-bath gem offers comfort, style, and functionality across two thoughtfully designed levels. Step inside to an open floor plan anchored by a cozy living room featuring a sleek fireplace, ideal for relaxing or entertaining. The chef-inspired kitchen boasts professional-grade appliances, clean modern lines, and seamless flow to the living and dining areas. New windows flood the home with natural light, highlighting every detail of the renovation, from the upgraded plumbing and electrical systems to the brand-new A/C. Retreat to spacious bedrooms and spa-like bathrooms with contemporary finishes. A large entertainment room with its own fireplace opens directly to a massive patio, perfect for gatherings or quiet evenings under the stars. The lush, landscaped backyard offers privacy and serenity, framed by mature greenery.Enjoy the convenience of a 2-car attached garage and close proximity to local amenities. Just minutes from South Pasadena and downtown Los Angeles, and within walking distance to a nearby elementary school. This home offers the perfect blend of suburban tranquility and city accessibility.

text: Welcome to your dream home! This stunning single-story residence, located in the Historic Neighborhood of Alhambra, features 3 spacious bedrooms and 2.5 beautifully appointed bathrooms, offering comfort and style for all your family needs. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a bright open floor plan that seamlessly connects the living room, dining area, and modern kitchen perfect for entertaining friends and family. This home boasts a delightful bonus room that can be transformed into a home office, playroom, or media room providing you with endless possibilities to suit your lifestyle. Step outside to your private yard, where you'll find flourishing fruit trees, including avocado, lemon, tangerine, apple, fig, peach, guava and pear trees, that provide both beauty and the joy of homegrown produce. Whether youre hosting summer barbecues or simply relaxing in the sun, this outdoor space could become your personal oasis. The property also includes a spacious detached 2-car garage for your vehicles and additional storage, along with a versatile shed that can serve as a workshop, studio or extra storage space. Easy access to freeways, Downtown LA, Pasadena, Cal State LA, and a vibrant array of entertainment and dining options. Just within walking distance from your front door you will find Granada Park. This nearby park transforms everyday living into an outdoor adventure, with playgrounds, picnic areas, and ample open space. Schedule your private tour today and experience all the wonderful features this property has to offer!

text: Welcome to this charming single-family home located in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Alhambra. This residence offers excellent curb appeal, highlighted by a welcoming front porch that adds to its warm and inviting character. Upon entering, youll be greeted by a bright and spacious living room that seamlessly flows into the formal dining areaperfect for both everyday living and entertaining. The adjacent kitchen is thoughtfully situated next to the dining room with access to the backyard. The main level includes two generously sized bedrooms and a full hallway bathroom. Upstairs, you'll find two additional bedrooms and a second bathroom, offering plenty of space for a growing family or guests. Recent upgrades include copper plumbing and dual-pane windows. The expansive backyard is ideal for family gatherings and outdoor dining. An extra-long private driveway provides extra parking spaces. The house is also located just blocks from Valley Boulevard and within the prestigious Alhambra Unified School Districthome to the highly regarded Mark Keppel High School. With a bit of TLC, this home is truly a hidden gem waiting to shine.

text: First time on the market in 50 years, this charming 1928 Spanish Revival is full of original character and timeless appeal. Architectural details throughout the home reflect the beauty of Alhambra, Spain from which the city is named after. Inside, you will find three spacious bedrooms and one full bathroom with 9 foot alcove ceilings throughout the house. The living room is a showstopper with 11 foot barrel vaulted ceilings, a classic masonry fireplace, and a large arched front window that fills the space with natural light. The adjacent dining room features an alcove ceiling and original floor-to-ceiling wood casement windows that open onto the front porch. The kitchen offers ample counter space and connects to a cozy breakfast nook, while a formal dining room provides the perfect setting for entertaining. The expansive backyard is a rare find, offering plenty of space to expand, garden, or build additional units. A detached two car garage sits at the rear of the property, adding even more versatility. This is a unique opportunity for both investors and owner users to reimagine a historic home in a prime location. With some cosmetic updates, this property can truly shine. Do not miss this exceptional offering. Situated on a generous lot and adjacent to South Pasadena, the property is zoned Residential Medium Density (RM), allowing for up to three units or an ADU. This is an incredible opportunity with endless potential.

text: Welcome to 221 N. Marguerita Ave #B a well-maintained 2-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom condo located in a gated community in the heart of Alhambra. This move-in ready home features a bright and functional layout, a cozy gas fireplace in the living room, a dedicated dining area, and a well-equipped kitchen with a convenient half bath on the main level. Upstairs, the spacious primary suite offers an en-suite bath and access to a large private patioperfect for relaxing or entertaining. A second full bathroom in the hallway serves the secondary bedroom. Recent improvements include new interior paint, modernized kitchen and bathroom finishes, and a brand-new roof installed in 2024. Additional highlights include in-unit laundry, an attached 2-car garage with direct access, guest parking, low HOA dues, and a quiet, well-kept complex. Conveniently located just minutes from Pasadena, major freeways, shopping, dining, and schoolsthis is a fantastic opportunity for homeowners or investors in one of Alhambras most desirable neighborhoods.

text: Priced to sell with instant equity upside, this prime investment offering sits on a spacious 7, 213 square foot lot. 1113 Hellman Avenue is a legal two unit duplex with flexible zoning (ALRPD ) that provides multiple paths for development or long term value. Whether you envision building a custom single family residence, a modern duplex, adding an ADU, or pursuing multiple units, this property offers the flexibility and space to bring your vision to life (buyer to verify with the city). Both units can be delivered vacant at close or provide immediate rental income with a short term rent back, whichever is preferred for investors, builders, or creative buyers. The expansive lot offers ample room to expand, reconfigure, or redevelop according to your goals and investment strategy. Ideally located near schools, Atlantic Times Square, shopping, restaurants, and major freeway access, this centrally located property is well positioned for those seeking growth, convenience, and versatility in a high demand market. Do not miss this chance to unlock value in a vibrant pocket of Alhambra.

text: Welcome to this charming home nestled on a picturesque, tree-lined street in the historic Emery Park Tract of Alhambra. This beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home features a bright and open floor plan designed for both comfort and functionality. The heart of the home is the modern kitchen, complete with custom cabinetry, sleek quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and aesthetic tile backsplash. Thoughtful upgrades throughout include, all updated energy efficient windows, new plank flooring, fiber internet, energy-efficient LED lighting, a new split A/C system, and a sliding glass door that brings in natural light and provides easy access to the outdoor space, which is perfect for entertaining. Located just minutes from Costco, local restaurants, shops, schools, and Main Street, this home offers the perfect blend of convenience and charm. This turnkey home has everything you need, come see it soon before it's gone! Inquire about the possibility of assuming the VA loan.

text: Best value for the area. Welcome to this charming tri-level corner unit condominium located in the gated Marengo Manor community in Alhambra. With 1, 260 sq. ft. of well-maintained living space, this 2-bedroom, 2.5-bath home, complete with an additional versatile bonus room/office with closet, offers the perfect blend of privacy, natural light, and functionality. A newly installed air conditioning system ensures year-round comfort in this inviting space. As a desirable corner unit, this home is filled with abundant natural light and provides enhanced privacy. The main level features a spacious living room with soaring ceilings, a cozy fireplace, and sliding glass doors that open to a private balcony. The adjacent dining area includes a wet bar and connects seamlessly to the kitchen, creating a welcoming atmosphere for entertaining. The bonus room on the second level is perfect for a home office, creative retreat, or exercise space. On the upper level, the master suite offers a private rooftop deck, ideal for enjoying your morning coffee or unwinding after a long day. Additional features include in-unit laundry hookups, two side-by-side parking spaces with storage, and a thoughtful layout that balances openness and privacy. The gated community boasts resort-style amenities, including a sparkling pool, spa, and clubhouse. Ideally situated in the heart of Alhambra, you are moments away from nearby shops, trendy restaurants, and cafes. The neighborhood boasts top-rated schools, convenient public transportation, and the I-10 freeway. Don't miss your opportunity to own this private, light-filled corner unit in a fantastic community.

text: Nestled in the prestigious Olive Tract in North Alhambra sits 1217 Saint Charles Terrace. Built in 1912, this south facing two story Craftsman-style home presents with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms in the main house and includes almost 2400SF of living space. Upon entering the home, the inviting wide front porch will have buyers reminiscing of the architectural charm in the early 1900s. Original hardwood floors, wainscoting, and built in cabinetry in the formal living room and dining room compliment the extensive remodel in 2024. New dual pane windows fill the home with an abundance of natural light in every room. The main level includes a primary suite perfect for multi generation living, an office, 2 updated bathrooms, and a remodeled kitchen. The second story includes 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. All of the bathrooms have been updated with designer grade tile, copper plumbing, and new drain lines. Energy efficient upgrades include ductless AC units in every room and a tankless water heater. Sitting on an expansive parcel of 8, 633SF, this lot also offers potential for all types of buyers. Both structures in the rear also have utilities readily available for multiple ADUs and be used as an extension to the main house. Central to all of Alhambra's best and adjacent to San Marino/South Pasadena, this home is suitable for all present buyers and offers a great hedge with value-add potential.

text: Welcome to this beautifully maintained senior condominium located in a desirable, security-gated community in the heart of downtown Alhambrajust steps from the intersection of North 2nd Street and Main Street. This spacious 3rd-floor corner unit providing a comfortable and vibrant living space ideal for those seeking convenience, peace, and community. Enjoy all that downtown Alhambra has to offer, including a variety of restaurants, shops, banks, a Sunday farmers market, movie theater, and moreall within walking distance. Key features include: No age restriction to purchase; only one resident must be 62+; Corner unit with only one shared wall for added privacy. Mountain views and natural sunlight through large windows. Modern kitchen with granite countertops and maple cabinetry. Custom window shutters and in-unit laundry. Primary bedroom with walk-in closet and en-suite bath. Charming courtyard directly in front of the unit with ample seating. Community amenities: library, multi-purpose recreation room, and two elevators (one with direct access to subterranean parking). One designated parking space in the gated underground garage. This condo is perfect for seniors seeking both independence and access to a connected, walkable community lifestyle.

text: Beautifully Updated 2-Bedroom Home in Prime Alhambra 55+ Community Welcome to this beautifully maintained 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home located in one of Alhambras most desirable senior communities. This rare single-level unit offers the ultimate in convenience, with no interior steps, direct access from the private parking garage, and close proximity to the community laundry room and outdoor drying area, a charming front patio and an enclosed interior patio offer peaceful outdoor spaces to relax or garden in privacy. Freshly painted and filled with natural light, the open and airy floor plan creates a warm and inviting atmosphere. Major updates in 2017all completed with city permits including: removed popcorn from ceiling (including testing to make sure there's no asbestos). New copper throughout unit for water pipes, new AC system, new duct work installed for central air system, including new insulation in roof for energy efficiency, new Bosch dishwasher. Installed electrical and plumbing for the custom laundry cabinet to have washer and dryer in patio. Installed all new windows, sliding glass doors, double paned for energy efficiency. Installed new exterior light on patio, new wood flooring throughput the living space. New garage door lift which is Wi-Fi enabled. The open-concept kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining area and spacious living roomideal for both quiet evenings and entertaining guests. Both bedrooms are generously sized suites with ample closet space, providing comfort and privacy thats hard to find. Residents enjoy access to a range of amenities, including a clubhouse, sparkling pool, and well-maintained common areas. Located on bustling Valley Blvd, this home is just minutes from Alhambra Place, Main Street, San Gabriel Plaza, supermarkets, restaurants, public transportation, and more. Easy access to the 10 and 710 freeways makes commuting to Downtown LA, Pasadena, and surrounding areas a breeze. This is a rare opportunity to own a move-in-ready home in a sought-after communityschedule your private showing today!

text: Welcome to Unit E at 2620 W Grand Avea beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath townhome-style condo in the heart of Alhambra. This bright, front-facing unit features abundant natural light, a double-door entry, high ceilings, and a spacious layout. The inviting living room includes a cozy fireplace and leads just a few steps up to a formal dining area and large family roomideal for both entertaining and everyday living. The remodeled kitchen showcases sleek quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a convenient breakfast bar. Enjoy new waterproof plank flooring, fresh interior paint, and 2.5 tastefully updated bathrooms. The oversized master suite offers vaulted ceilings, two closets, and a modern en-suite bath. With an attached two-car garage, in-unit laundry, and a prime location just steps from Alhambra Park, shopping, and dining on Main Street, this move-in ready home blends comfort, style, and convenience.

text: The stunning single-level residence located in the heart of Alhambra, with 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, showcasing a mixture of Spanish-style elegance and a modern touch. Stepping through the delightful front porch, the living room with light pouring through the revival stained glass welcomes you. The kitchen is completed with premium stainless-steel appliances, custom designed island with cabinetries and new countertops. The cozy dining room leads you to the back yard and into a Gazebo. The bedrooms, basement, bathrooms, are located on both sides of the hallway which is filled with skylight. The floor-to-ceiling windows, in the primary suite, create a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor, which attract your attention; the master bathroom is fitted with a lighted, anti-fog mirror, dual sinks, and a custom designed shower. Stepping out and onto the backyard deck, trees and grass mixing with fresh air wraps you around. The whole house has been updated with all new floors throughout, interior painting, exterior stucco, brand new AC, plumbing, whole house rewiring, double-pane windows, doors, front and back porch tiles and landscape. Moreover, this renovated two-car garage with dual front and rear access not only offers convenient parking but also greatly enhances the functionality of the property. The spacious backyard holds excellent potential for future expansion and makes it ideal for adding an ADU giving you even more lifestyle flexibility. With the main house and garage facing two different streets, this property offers the perfect balance of comfortable living and strong investment potential. Ideally located near top-rated schools, restaurants, supermarkets and parks, this hidden gem is ready for you to discover and call your HOME.

text: Welcome to this lovely single-family home located in a quiet and highly sought-after neighborhood in Alhambra. This well-maintained residence offers 2 spacious bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms, with a comfortable 1, 251 sq ft of living space situated on a generous 6, 141 sq ft lot. Step into a bright and spacious living room featuring lots of windows that invite in natural light and a cozy fireplace, perfect for relaxing evenings. The home boasts beautiful wood flooring throughout, adding warmth and elegance to every room. The primary bedroom includes a convenient powder room, and both bedrooms are generously sized. An enclosed patio offers a versatile bonus space ideal for a home office, playroom, or potential third bedroom. Outside, youll find a beautifully landscaped front and back yard filled with vibrant flowers and mature fruit treesa serene setting for outdoor enjoyment. A detached two-car garage provides ample parking and storage, with great potential for an ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit). Located just minutes from Downtown Los Angeles and with easy access to the 10 Freeway, this home offers the perfect blend of suburban charm and city convenience. Dont miss this opportunity to own a gem in one of Alhambras most desirable areas!

text: Rare Alhambra Duplex Opportunity Live in One, Rent the Other! Welcome to this versatile and well-located duplex in the heart of Alhambra, featuring two detached residential structures on a spacious 7, 151 sq ft lot. With a total of 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms across 2, 894 sq ft, this property offers the perfect blend of owner-occupancy and income-generating potential. The front unit offers 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms with a spacious layoutideal for comfortable family living. The rear unit is a separate 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom homeperfect for rental income, extended family, or guests. Each unit has its own private entrance and access to generous parking: a 2-car garage plus additional space in the backyard and carport area that can accommodate at least 56 more vehicles. This setup ensures maximum flexibility and privacy. Located within the Alhambra Unified School District, the home is close to top-rated schools and only minutes away from Main Street dining, shopping centers, Alhambra Park, public library, and civic center. With a Walk Score of 91, daily errands and entertainment are all within reach. Zoned ALRPD (Alhambra Residential Planned Development), the property is currently a legal duplex and also offers potential for future expansionsuch as adding a third unit or converting into a multi-family configuration, subject to city approval. This presents a rare and valuable opportunity in one of Alhambras most desirable neighborhoods. Dont miss the chance to own a flexible-use, income-producing property in a prime location with long-term growth potential.

text: Welcome to this beautiful hilltop home tucked away on a peaceful cul-de-sac in the charming Historical Granada Park neighborhood of Alhambra. This spacious and sun-filled residence offers 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. Inside, youll find a bright and open floor plan with 2, 026 sq ft of living space thats filled with natural light. The main living area flows effortlessly and is ideal for both relaxing and entertaining. Step outside to enjoy spectacular views and take in the sunrise with your morning coffee or wind down in the evening with a gorgeous sunset. The expansive 14, 015 sq ft lot is a true highlight, featuring over 30 mature fruit trees and multiple outdoor spaces to enjoy year-round. The backyard includes two large gazebos (10x10 and 12x12), new deck pavers, and updated fencing that adds both charm and privacy. This home is thoughtfully upgraded with comfort, convenience, and functional design in mind. Upgrades include a newer central AC/heating pump and condenser, 18 paid-off solar panels, new tankless water heater, new copper main line, updated electrical panel with dual Tesla chargers, and CAT 5 internet wiring throughout. Also features brand-new windows and stylish shutters, enhancing both energy efficiency and aesthetic appeal. Youll also appreciate the RV parking area complete with electric, water, and sewer hookups, as well as a new automatic gate and a 21x12 concrete parking pad. All this is situated in a family friendly neighborhood close to all amenities with access to parks, Alhambra Golf Course, Monterey Highlands Elementary, Mark Keppel High, restaurants, shopping centers, and easy freeway access. This gem is A Must See!

text: Spacious, Remodeled 4-Bedroom Home in Alhambras Coveted Midwick Tract Welcome to 2208 Whitney Drivea beautifully updated 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home located in the desirable Midwick Tract of Alhambra, just one block from scenic Granada Park. This charming residence blends timeless character with modern upgrades, offering a warm and inviting atmosphere in one of the areas most sought-after neighborhoods. Inside, youll find original hardwood floors that add warmth and elegance to the living spaces. The remodeled open-concept kitchen features stylish finishes and flows seamlessly into the spacious family roomperfect for entertaining or everyday living. A standout feature of this home is the permitted primary bedroom addition, complete with a beautifully remodeled ensuite bathroom. This private retreat offers generous space, abundant natural light, and a thoughtfully designed layout for comfort and relaxation. Situated on a generous lot, the home includes a long driveway, detached garage, and a private backyard with potential for an ADU (buyer to verify). Whether youre looking to host, garden, or simply enjoy the outdoors, this home offers the space and flexibility to fit your lifestyle. Enjoy the best of Alhambra living with close proximity to parks, shopping, dining, and major freewaysplus quick access to Downtown Los Angeles. Dont miss your chance to own this move-in-ready gem in a prime location!

text: Charming 4 bedroom 3 bathroom house located at a nice and convenient location of Alhambra. Two bedroom two full bathroom downstairs, and two bedroom 1 full bathroom upstairs. This beautiful home has an open and flexible floor plan with great potential to be split into two units, each with its own entrance. A detached two-car garage also has good potential to be turned into an ADU. Great opportunity for family looking to occupied one section (downstairs or upstairs), and rent out the other section for extra income. Within walking distance to the very reputable Fremont Elementary School that serves from Kindergarten to 8th Grade. Cal State LA University, East Los Angeles College, and major shopping stores such as Costco, Target, 99Ranch Market, Albertson, Walmart, Hawaii Supermarket, ALDI, etc are all within 15 minutes drive.

text: NEW NEW NEW Step into a breathtakingly reimagined bungalow in the coveted North Alhambra neighborhood, moments from the charm of Pasadena and San Marino. Every inch of this adorable home sparkles with brand-new upgrades: energy-efficient dual-pane windows, sleek cabinets, modern flooring, and vibrant interior and exterior lighting, including chic recessed fixtures. A month-old composite roof crowns both the house and the detached two-car garage, blending durability with style. The open-concept living space flows seamlessly into a dazzling kitchen, featuring a new sink, stove, oven, hood, and luxurious Quartz Calacatta countertops. The spa-inspired bathroom boasts a new vanity and a stunning glass shower door. Two inviting bedrooms with closets include one with a private yard entrance, offering endless flexibility for guests or a home office. Freshly painted inside and out, this move-in-ready gem is perfect for first-time buyers, down-sizers, or savvy investors seeking a prime rental opportunity. Beyond the doorstep, savor Alhambras vibrant Main Street dining and shopping, relax in nearby Almansor Park, or explore Pasadenas cultural treasuresall just minutes away. Dont miss this rare chance to own a turnkey masterpiece in a location that truly has it all!

text: Welcome to this super cool four-unit building, perfectly situated on a desirable corner lot in the vibrant heart of Alhambra. This well-maintained property exudes a unique Mid-Century vibe and is ideal for those seeking style and sophistication. The building is comprised of two spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bath units and two charming 1-bedroom, 1-bath units, each adorned with windows on every wall, allowing abundant natural sunlight and a refreshing breeze throughout the space. The central stairway design provides separation and privacy between units. Recently painted, the building boasts eye-catching curb appeal, complemented by a meticulously maintained grassy lawn both in the front and side yards. The fenced and gated yard features a common-use patio, perfect for relaxation and community gatherings.For added practicality, the garages are situated in a separate building, featuring three locking doors. Two units share a double garage, and there's ample street parking for guests. Alhambra's cultural richness and community spirit shine through with accessible amenities. Enjoy an array of nearby restaurants, catch the latest films at local theaters, near schools, and relish in the city's lively atmosphere and unique shopping experiences. text: Pepperton Garden - a Front-Unit Townhouse in a well-maintained and rarely available complex. The front door opens to a foyer, and just a few steps up, you'll find the bright second-level living space featuring large windows and well-sized, open-concept living and dining areas that lead to a balcony. The spacious kitchen offers recessed lighting and is fully equipped with ample cabinets and counter space. It includes a brand-new dishwasher, range, and range hood. A convenient half bath is also located on this level. All three generously sized bedrooms are on the third level, including a master suite with a private bath. The two additional bedrooms share a full bathroom. The laundry area is conveniently located on the same floor. Upgrades include new mini blinds and fresh paint throughout. An attached two-car garage is located on the bottom level. Excellent location near shopping, restaurants, schools, Costco, and all the amenities of Main Street. The HOA fee includes water and alarm service. Come see your new home today!

text: Welcome to 89 E Commonwealth Avenue, Unit 1I a spacious and beautifully updated townhome offering 2, 000 square feet, making it the largest unit in the community. This special two-level feels more like a single-family home with its generous layout, private dual entrances, and abundant natural light throughout. Featuring 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, this home is thoughtfully designed to accommodate both everyday living and entertaining. As you enter, youll be welcomed by an inviting open-concept living and dining area, freshly painted and enhanced by brand-new vinyl flooring that adds warmth and elegance to the space. Large windows frame leafy views while allowing sunlight to pour in, creating a bright and airy atmosphere. The main level includes a powder bathroom and a flexible space perfect for guests, a home office, or multi-generational living. The kitchen opens up to the dining area, making it easy to host and gather. Upstairs, the primary suite boasts a walk in closet space and a well-appointed en-suite bathroom. Two additional spacious bedrooms and a third full bath provide plenty of room for everyone. This units two separate front door entrances offer added convenience and flexibility. A laundry area is conveniently located on the second floor, and the unit comes with two assigned side by side parking and secure community access. Located just minutes from Alhambras vibrant Main Street corridor, youll enjoy easy access to shopping, restaurants, entertainment, and highly rated schools. With nearby parks and quick access to downtown LA, this location blends suburban charm with urban convenience. Dont miss this incredible opportunity to own the largest and most versatile townhome in this sought-after community. Whether you're upsizing, investing, or purchasing your first home, Unit 1I offers size, style, and an unbeatable location.

text: This property is in a High Demand area of Alhambra. The Home has a large 1, 361 Square Feet (From Tax Assessor's Records) and has 3 bedrooms, a Den, a Very Large Kitchen with inside laundry facilities for a washing machine and dryer, a Formal Dining Room, and 1 Full Bathroom. A Covered Patio is attached to the rear of the home. There is an Extra-Large Garage (Apx. 20' X 30' and built in 1968) which includes a Workshop Room at the rear that could also be used as a Playroom. The lot size is a spacious 6, 473 Square Feet (From Tax Assessor's Records). The property can accommodate many vehicles due to a wide driveway area inside the Security Gate plus the additional Oversized Garage parking. There is a nice backyard with Avocado, Fig, and Lemon Trees. There is also a Laundry Tub/Sink outside of the home on the driveway side. The property does need some repairing and remodeling and is being sold completely in it's present as is physical condition. Conveniently located with all the supermarkets, restaurants, entertainment, parks, and freeway access that Alhambra has to offer.

text: Charming Spanish-style home in prime Alhambra location! Nestled in one of Alhambra's most sought neighborhoods. This 3 Bed & 2 Bath home sits on a spacious 7, 800 sq ft hilltop lot with sweeping views and endless possibilities. Spacious Living room. Large master bedroom with french door open to the back yard. Separate dining room from living room. accessible laundry room, Japanese style room can be used as breakfast area. Central A/C. This 7, 800 sq. ft. lot on top of the hill with wide views has limitless potential for expansion, ADU and upgrades. Conveniently located to Downtown Los Angeles, 10 freeway and minutes away from South Pasadena, Costco and shopping center within blocks. This home offers a great deal of flexibility to make it your own dream home.

text: Newly constructed and located in the heart of Alhambra. Located within minutes to So. Pasadena, San Marino and San Gabriel, The Langham Huntington in Pasadena, Lacy Park, Alhambra Golf Course and Mission District. Beautiful 2 Story Mediterranean style building with lush landscaping. This end unit offers a cozy, bright and beautiful open concept living room with kitchen and 1/4 bath on first floor. Off the kitchen you have a door that leads out to the community area. As you walk up stairs you have the laundry area, a beautiful master suite with full bath and the 2nd bedroom. 2 car garage below with private gate.
formatted_address: 300 E Alhambra Rd Unit F, Alhambra, CA, 91801

text: This mid-century condo offers the perfect blend of modern amenities and classic charm. Located in a highly sought-after central area of Alhambra, this light-filled home boasts high ceilings that create a spacious, open atmosphere. With updated flooring throughout, the condo features a fireplace, three generously sized bedrooms and two bathrooms, providing ample space for both relaxation and hosting guests. Enjoy year-round comfort with central air and heat, ensuring the ideal temperature no matter the season. Step outside to your private gated patio, a serene retreat perfect for enjoying the outdoors in peace and privacy. Residents also have access to exceptional community amenities, including a sparkling pool, spa, and a clubhouse for social gatherings and events. Whether you're looking to relax in style or stay active with neighbors, this condo provides the perfect setting for a vibrant 55+ lifestyle. Don't miss the chance to make this beautifully maintained home your own!

text: Step inside this warm and inviting newly renovated home, 1520 S Olive ave offers you both vintage charm and modern conveniences. The layout features versatile spacesideal for a growing family or income property with two cozy bonus rooms at separate entrance. The well-appointed kitchen and abundant natural light make it an entertainers delight. Everything inside are BRAND NEW including but not limited for hardwood flooring, countertops, appliances and central AC system. Newer roof and gutters were replaced in 2022. There are two bonus room upstairs too. Outdoors, the expansive lot supports both relaxation and active lifestyles, with a pool and covered patios ideal for gatherings. Easy access to restaurants, valley blvd, schools, supermarkets and freeway I-10. You've got everything you want within walking distance. With significant updates plus a sought-after, well-maintained community location with top schools, this property presents an excellent combination of character, comfort, and long-term potential. Don't miss the opportunity to make this Move-in ready gem your new home!

text: Welcome to this beautifully updated end-unit Spanish townhome, ideally located just one block from Main Street and Marengo Avenue in the heart of Alhambra. Offering both timeless charm and modern updates, this residence is a rare gem.Step inside to discover a bright, airy interior with natural light streaming through large windows. The living room features rich laminate wood flooring and brand-new recessed lighting. The spacious, open-concept kitchen is a chef's delight, complete with quartz countertops, new stainless steel stove, updated sink and fixtures, modern ceiling light, and a stylish chandelier over the adjacent dining area.The highly sought-after layout includes a main-floor bedroom--perfect for guests or a home office--and an updated full bath with a new white Carrera marble vanity, fresh fixtures, lighting, mirror, shower head, and toilet. A dramatic contemporary gold chandelier adds a designer touch to the stairwell.Upstairs, you'll find two generous primary suites, each with new ceiling lighting. The larger suite includes a private balcony and a custom-lit walk-in closet. Its en-suite bath has been tastefully remodeled with a double vanity featuring quartz counters, updated fixtures, mirrors, lighting, shower head, and toilet. The second suite also includes an upgraded private bath with new vanity, lighting, fixtures, and toilet.Additional features include a large laundry room, an expansive private garage with extra storage and new lighting, plus an additional carport space for a total of three dedicated parking spots. The home has been freshly painted throughout, with new carpeting and modern silver hardware completing the turnkey feel.With a Walk Score of 77, you're minutes from Target, Costco, Aldi, Alhambra Park, and top dining spots. This exceptional home offers refined living in a prime location--schedule your private tour today and experience the best of Alhambra living.
formatted_address: 1713 Acacia St Unit A, Alhambra, CA, 91801

text: Dreaming of a haven framed by vibrant blooms on a serene street in Alhambra? An inviting path draws you into this beautifully remodeled single-story residence, where modern upgrades and timeless touches create a welcoming sanctuary! Recessed lighting, crisp white hues, and wide-plank flooring set a fresh, refined tone throughout the interior, as sunlight pours in via bright windows. Your living room centers around an elegant fireplace with a classic mantle, while the adjacent dining alcove enjoys warmth from its picture window. In the kitchen, stainless steel appliances, luminous countertops, and ample cabinetry make cooking feel effortless. Two restful bedrooms share a sleek bath, and a flexible bonus room flows into your family corner, ideal for work, play, or relaxation. Venture outside to a secluded backyard with a generous patio ready for weekend BBQs. A gated driveway leads to a detached 2-car garage complete with a built-in workbench and shelves. Located near CSU LA, parks, shops, and major freeways, this home offers a lifestyle that's inspiring. Discover comfort amidst all the possibilities it holds!

text: Welcome home to this beautifully updated and maintained three-bedroom, two and a half bath condo in the heart of Alhambra. Nestled on a quiet, tree-lined street just minutes from the heart of Downtown Alhambra, renowned for its restaurant row, charming cafes, and shopping centers, this spacious townhouse-style condo offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. Located just 3 minutes to South Pasadena, a 5-minute walk to Target and Costco, and only 10 minutes to Old Town Pasadena's vibrant shopping & restaurants. Step inside to find gorgeous hardwood floors throughout, a large modern kitchen with an eat-in island, and elegant countertops in both the kitchen and bathrooms. Enjoy the upscale touches of recessed lighting, custom window shutters, and tasteful light fixtures that add warmth and sophistication to every room. Features of this property that make it such a great home include an the updated kitchen with new Quartz countertops and refinished cabinets, updated bathrooms, spacious primary suite, new recessed lighting, new carpet, new interior paint, custom closet organizers, newer HVAC system (5 years old), and new front yard landscaping. The community is gated and features one of the lowest HOAs in the area at $138 per month. This includes coverage for water, trash, interior fire sprinklers, exterior insurance, and maintenance of all common areas. This home has been priced to sell! Don't miss your chance to own this beautiful home in one of the most prime and desirable locations!

text: Welcome to this spacious and well-maintained 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom condo, nestled on a quiet, tree-lined street in the heart of Alhambra! Just minutes from South Pasadena and Downtown Alhambra, renowned for its restaurant row, charming cafes, and shopping centers. Only 5 minutes to Costco, Target, and 99 Ranch Market, and 10 minutes to Old Town Pasadena. Easy access to the 10 and 710 freeways, public transit, and all the best the San Gabriel Valley has to offer. Step inside to find a bright and functional layout, offering two stories of comfortable living above an attached two-car garage with a dedicated storage room. The main level features a spacious living room filled with natural light, a designated dining area, and a well-sized kitchen with a breakfast area. Upstairs, youll find three bedrooms, including a generous primary suite with an en-suite bathroom and ample closet space. Additional highlights include central HVAC, in-unit laundry, and great overall flow throughout the home. Currently tenant-occupied with a long-term tenant on a month-to-month lease. The tenant has lovingly maintained the property and made thoughtful improvements, making this an ideal opportunity for investors seeking stable rental income from day one. Broker and broker's agents do not represent or guarantee accuracy of the square footage, bedroom / bathroom count, lot size, and/or any other information concerning the conditions or features of the property. Buyer/Tenant is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection & with appropriate professionals to satisfy themselves.

text: Nestled atop the serene Alhambra Hills in the exclusive Midwick Park neighborhood, this meticulously maintained home boasts a stunning blend of comfort and style. With breathtaking city light views, the property offers 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 pristine bathrooms. The open-concept living area features a bright, airy living room with large windows that flood the space with natural light, perfect for relaxation or entertaining. The chefs kitchen is a dream, with a large island, stainless steel appliances, and a wine refrigerator for those who appreciate the finer things. The master suite is a true retreat, complete with a walk-in closet. Step outside to a sprawling backyard, where panoramic city views and lush tropical fruit treessuch as cherimoya, mango, mulberry, and kumquatcreate a serene oasis. The outdoor space includes three storage rooms, a built-in bar, and a BBQ station, ideal for hosting gatherings with family and friends.Conveniently located near top-rated schools, shopping centers, and major freeway access, this home is a rare gem that must be seen to be truly appreciated.

text: Rarely find beautiful single house in the market for the first time over 30 years+, with large lot 7622 sf, and alley at the back, perfect for add ADU. House has 2 bedrooms and 2 bath at the first floor, with huge master bedroom, dinning room , large family room and living room, large updated kitchen granite counter top and many cabinets. There are 2 unpermitted bonus rooms up stair, around 300 sf. Large detached garage about 600 sf, and has a storage room next to the garage. A lot of roses, fruit trees at the front yard and back yard, side yard. Property sold in as is conditions, no repair or credit from seller. House is located in Alhambra school district, walking distance to Elementary school and Valley Bl, very convenience to market and restaurant.

text: Discover the perfect blend of classic charm and modern convenience in this beautifully crafted Spanish-style residence. Featuring warm wood floors, graceful arched doorways, and a traditional Spanish tile roof, the home exudes timeless character at every turn. Inside, bright and inviting interiors are enhanced by recessed lighting throughout, while the thoughtfully designed kitchen stands out with a sleek gas range and a charming Dutch door that opens to a private side yard--ideal for seamless indoor-outdoor living.This home is as efficient as it is elegant, equipped with a solar power system that keeps energy costs down. Additional highlights include a detached garage and the convenience of an EV charging plug-in located right on the street. Whether you're entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet moment at home, this residence effortlessly combines vintage appeal with modern-day functionality.

text: Beautifully Updated Turnkey Home in Prime Alhambra Location Near South Pasadena. Situated on a quiet, tree-lined street just blocks from South Pasadena and Alhambra Park, this charming single-family home offers the perfect blend of classic character and modern upgrades in one of Alhambras most desirable neighborhoods. Inside, you'll be welcomed by original hardwood flooring and a fully remodeled kitchen featuring vintage-style cabinetry, granite countertops, porcelain tile flooring, and premium Viking appliances. All bathrooms have been thoughtfully renovated, and the home is further enhanced with copper plumbing, new electrical panel, double-pane windows, a newer roof, and a central A/C unitall part of a comprehensive renovation completed in 2011. The detached, oversized two-car garage is fully insulated and features built-in storage cabinets, laundry cabinetry, and a sinkproviding excellent potential for conversion into an ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit) or expanded living space. The generous lot also allows room for future additions. Conveniently located near public parks, top-rated schools, shopping centers, dining options, and major freeways, this home is a rare turnkey opportunity in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley. Dont miss your chance to own this hidden gem!

text: Discover the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and modern living in this meticulously maintained luxury townhome, ideally situated in the heart of North Alhambra. Boasting a total of 2, 154 square feet, including a 282 sq ft bonus room, this spacious residence offers a quiet retreat just moments away from restaurants, shops, 99 Ranch Market and the Huntington Library. Step into the expansive living room featuring soaring ceilings, a cozy fireplace, and an open-concept layout that flows seamlessly into the dining areaperfect for entertaining or relaxing evenings at home. A separate den near the entry offers flexibility as a home office or potential fourth bedroom. The tastefully updated kitchen features custom cabinetry, granite countertops, a charming garden window, and a breakfast bar that opens to a bright and inviting family room, ideal for casual gatherings. A convenient guest powder room and laundry closet completes the main floor. Upstairs, youll find a spacious primary suite complete with a walk-in closet, vanity area, and tranquil ensuite bath. Two additional bedrooms share a well-appointed hall bathroom with a tub and shower combo. The homes hidden gem is the oversized bonus room adjacent to the attached two-car garagea versatile space perfect for a home gym, studio, or additional family room. Enjoy low-maintenance living in a prime location with the luxury of space, thoughtful updates, low monthly HOA and proximity to all that Alhambra has to offer.

text: Monterey Bay Square is an exclusive, brand new mixed-use community offering 62 luxurious residences in the vibrant heart of Alhambra. Designed with modern elegance and meticulous attention to detail, each home features soaring ceilings, expansive windows that flood the space with natural light, and open floor plans perfect for both relaxing and entertaining. The interiors are enhanced by quartz countertops, high-end finishes, and private balconies that offer breathtaking views of both the surrounding mountains and city skyline. Residents of Monterey Bay Square enjoy unparalleled amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, an elegant resident lounge for social gatherings, and a beautifully landscaped terrace designed for outdoor relaxation. Located just minutes from Alhambra Squares premier dining, shopping, and cultural experiences, Monterey Bay Square offers the ideal blend of sophistication, comfort, and convenience. Schedule your private tour today and experience Monterey Bay Square in person!

text: Charming Spanish-style triplex nestled on a large lot in a quiet Alhambra neighborhood. Filled with original character and timeless appeal, this income-producing property offers a blend of charm, space, and upside potential. The lot is adorned with mature hedges and fruit trees, offering privacy and a touch of nature. The front building features two spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bath units, each with classic details, abundant natural light, and warm vintage finishes. Tucked away at the rear of the property, a generously sized 1-bedroom, 1-bath unit sits above three single-car garages -- possible ADU/JADU conversion? A large, gated driveway provides 3 additional off-street parking spaces. Located just minutes from Alhambra's vibrant shops, restaurants, and entertainment, this triplex is perfectly situated in a peaceful residential setting. With strong bones, curb appeal, and significant upside in rental income, this property is an excellent opportunity for both investors and owner-users alike. Tenant occupied, please do not bother occupants.

text: Remodeled single family home located in the heart of Alhambra, just minutes from the prestigious neighborhoods of San Marino and South Pasadena. This home features new hardwood laminate flooring, recessed lighting and open floor plan throughout. The entry opens to a spacious living room which showcases a gas fireplace insert with easy start and brand new shutters overlooking the beautifully landscaped front yard with grass and privacy hedges. The kitchen features quartz countertops and backsplash, cabinets with under cabin lighting, new vent and microwave over stove, and custom pantry. Each bedroom is spacious and offers ample closet space. One of the bedrooms has its own privacy door leading to the backyard patio. Additional features include: in-unit washer and dryer laundry room, central A/C, & fresh paint throughout. The laundry room has an access door to attached garage. The details are endless including custom storage rack in garage, cafe lighting to patio, exterior security lighting, custom redwood planter box with automatic lighting and irrigation to patio with privacy plants, palms and succulents. Just minutes from a variety of restaurants, shopping and entertainment. At such a central location, this beautiful home won't last long!

text: Investor or Owner-Occupant Opportunity in Prime North Alhambra! Rarely available triplex property located in the highly sought-after North Alhambra neighborhoodjust two blocks from prestigious San Marino. This well-maintained and versatile income property is perfect for investors or buyers looking to live in one unit and rent out the others. The front building features two identical floor plan, 1-bedroom and 1-bath units, 936 sf each, has full sized kitchen, dining room and in unit laundry, offering the potential to combine them into a spacious single-family home of 1872 sf with multiple bedrooms and bathrooms. These two units have recently installed dual pane windows, and unit 329 has a renovated kitchen and laundry room with granite countertop and newer cabinets. The rear detached unit includes 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and a bonus small room, ideal for use as an in-law suite, guest house, or additional rental income. Each unit enjoys its own private entrance for added convenience and privacy.

text: Monterey Bay Square is an exclusive, brand new mixed-use community offering 62 luxurious residences in the vibrant heart of Alhambra. Designed with modern elegance and meticulous attention to detail, each home features soaring ceilings, expansive windows that flood the space with natural light, and open floor plans perfect for both relaxing and entertaining. The interiors are enhanced by quartz countertops, high-end finishes, and private balconies that offer breathtaking views of both the surrounding mountains and city skyline. Residents of Monterey Bay Square enjoy unparalleled amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, an elegant resident lounge for social gatherings, and a beautifully landscaped terrace designed for outdoor relaxation. Located just minutes from Alhambra Squares premier dining, shopping, and cultural experiences, Monterey Bay Square offers the ideal blend of sophistication, comfort, and convenience.Schedule your private tour today and experience Monterey Bay Square in person!

text: Alhambra Regency Plaza is a 2015-built mixed-use community located in the heart of Downtown Alhambra. It offers excellent walkability to supermarkets, restaurants, a cinema, farmer's market, banks, library, parks, and the Alhambra Golf Course, with convenient access to public transportation and major freeways. Community amenities include a clubhouse, tennis court, central courtyard, secure gated parking, visitor entry system, and elevator access. Ground-level commercial spaces provide added convenience with shops, cafes, and daily services just steps away. This rare two-level penthouse unit (One of only 4 penthouses in the whole building!) offers 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a loft, and 3 parking spaces. The main living area features soaring ceilings, oversized windows, abundant natural light, and a tiled fireplace that adds both character and warmth. The kitchen is equipped with granite countertops, white cabinetry, recessed lighting, and a double-basin sink. A laundry closet is tucked nearby, and the large adjacent dining area supports both daily living and entertaining. The main-level primary suite includes a private balcony with city and mountain views, dual closets, and ensuite bathroom with soaking tub, a shower room, and dual vanities. Upstairs offers a functional layout loft with an arched window and a secondary bedroom with an en-suite bathideal for guests, remote work, or flexible living. A thoughtfully laid-out home offering style, space, and central convenienceperfect for homeowners or investors seeking long-term value.

text: Situated just two blocks south of the affluent cities of San Marino and South Pasadena, the property benefits from its location in one of the most attractive rental submarkets of the West San Gabriel Valley. Because the property is not subject to local rent control, an investor can increase rents by a greater amount each year, when compared with multifamily investments in Los Angeles and other local cities. With current rents approximately 21% below those of similar neighboring properties, a new owner may be able to add significant value while improving the building's cash flow substantially. Constructed in 1959, the two-story structure surrounds a well-landscaped, quiet courtyard atop a 14, 706-square foot lot. The property has been meticulously maintained throughout its ownership, while select units have been renovated with new hardwood floors, new kitchen cabinets, and new ceiling fans. The gated complex includes eight security cameras, several of which are trained on the 16 covered parking spaces. The landlord-owned laundry facilities add an additional revenue stream. The separate gas and electricity meters, pitched roofs, and partial copper plumbing should help to reduce future expenses. Located near the corner of Huntington Drive and Los Robles Avenue, the building sits just across the border from both San Marino and South Pasadena. Being within walking distance of Ralph's, In-N-Out Burger, and the new $130 million Alhambra Place Shopping Center helps to attract tenants. Median home values have increased by 40% since 2020, resulting in increased demand for rental units as residents are priced out of homeownership now that the median single-family home is valued above $1, 000, 000. Apartment demand in the area is also elevated due to the fact that Alhambra has only added 540 units over the past 30 years. This amount of new development is up to 10 times slower than other communities in the area, and the resulting demand for existing apartments is projected to exert sustained upwards pressure on local rents, benefitting apartment landlords. The property also sits just two miles from the 110 Freeway and two-and-a-half miles from the10 Freeway, affording tenants convenient access to Downtown Los Angeles, Pasadena, and the rest of the San Gabriel Valley.

text: Welcome to 89 E. Commonwealth, a beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 3-bathroom end-unit home in the highly sought-after Gateway Walk community. Offering 1, 650 square feet of modern living space, this turnkey property features stunning flooring throughout and double-pane windows that flood the home with natural light while enhancing energy efficiency. The chefs kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, microwave, and range/oven, making it ideal for both everyday meals and entertaining. The spacious family room, conveniently located near the stairs, can also serve as a perfect work-from-home space. Upstairs, youll find two generous bedrooms, each with easy access to the stackable laundry unit. With three bathrooms, there's plenty of room for comfort and privacy for both residents and guests. Enjoy year-round comfort with central cooling, and take advantage of the 2 parking spaces in the detached garage. Located in a premium spot within Gateway Walk, this end-unit offers both tranquility and privacy with only one shared wall. The HOA maintains the patio area and all common areas, adding to the overall convenience and appeal of this fantastic home.

text: It is a modern three-story townhome located in the heart of Alhambra, California. Built in 2020, it is part of the WoodHaven Estates community. The property features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, and approximately 1, 613 square feet of living space, along with a 2-car attached garage. The home boasts a sleek urban-modern exterior and an open-concept interior with ample natural light and a fluid layout. Brand new flooring just installed. Equipped with stainless steel appliances, soft-close cabinets, white granite countertops, and a central island perfect for cooking and entertaining. The first floor includes a private bedroom with a full bathroom, ideal for guests or extended family. The second floor features an open kitchen, dining area, and living room with access to a covered balcony. WoodHaven Estates offers residents access to a modern clubhouse, swimming pool, spa, and BBQ area perfect for relaxation and socializing. No Mello-Roos tax, with a low property tax rate of approximately 1.04%, keeping long-term ownership costs down. Located near the center of Alhambra, the home is within walking distance of Marguerita Elementary School (rated 7/10) and Alhambra High School (rated 8/10) a great option for families with school-aged children.

text: Introducing Orchard Court, a meticulously crafted haven of elegance in the heart of the city of Alhambra. Built in 2024, this exclusive mixed-use development offers 10 luxurious residential townhomes and two premium retail units. Step inside to discover a world of modern luxury, with each residence boasting a gourmet kitchen featuring quartz countertops and contemporary cabinetry, complemented by 10-foot high ceilings and abundant natural light. This unit features an attached garage and a rooftop garden or deck, providing breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains. At Orchard Court, you will find yourself steps away from Sprouts, conveniently close to nearby attractions, such as the Edwards Alhambra Renaissance Theater, Alhambra Park, Arcadias golf courses, the Los Angeles Arboretum, Old Town Pasadena, numerous markets and shops, and much more. Additionally, youll enjoy scenic views of the San Gabriel Mountains. Seize the opportunity to elevate your lifestyleschedule your exclusive viewing of Orchard Court today and embark on a journey of refined living.

text: Location, Location, Location! Priced to sell! Welcome to 2209 W. Glendon Way, nestled in the highly desirable and historic Ethel Park neighborhood of Alhambra. This stunning 2-bedroom, 1-bath residence has been thoughtfully renovated from top to bottom. Step inside to find sun-filled living spaces with rich wood laminate flooring that flows throughout. Set in a safe and peaceful neighborhood, this home is a rare find with timeless character and modern upgrades throughout. Dont miss your chance to own a turn-key home in one of Alhambras most charming and sought-after areasa true must-see!

text: Welcome to this beautifully maintained 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom end-unit townhouse located in the highly desirable City of Alhambra. Offering 1, 438 sq ft of comfortable living space, this home is filled with abundant natural light and enjoys a gentle breeze throughout the day. Upon entry, you'll find a spacious living room to the right, complete with a cozy fireplaceperfect for relaxing evenings. There's also a dedicated area ideal for a study nook or homework station. The home features recessed lighting and stylish vinyl flooring throughout. The modern kitchen boasts quartz countertops, backsplash, making it both elegant and functional. Upstairs, the expansive master suite impresses with high ceilings and an upgraded shower, while the two additional bedrooms share a well-appointed hallway bathroom. Each bathroom includes a window for natural ventilation. Additional highlights include a two-car attached garage with extra storage space, and a location just minutes from local schools and parks. Don't miss this bright and breezy corner unitit's the perfect place to call home in a sought-after neighborhood.

text: This beautifully remodeled home located at a desirable neighborhood of the city of Monterey Park. Newer cabinets and counters are both in the kitchen and bathroom. Brand new floors throughout the living room, bedrooms, dan and the hallway. The house offers 3 bedrooms and 2 baths (Title shows 2 bedroom and 1 bath). A nice entry room can be used as a den. There is another mini family room by the third bedroom. The back door conveniently open to the back yard. 3 cars garage, 1 carport and 1 parking space in front of the garage. Delicious Loquat tree, litchi tree, orange tree and persimmon tree are well growing in the front yard and back yard. The larger lot is 5387 SF. A ADU is potentially allowed in the lot. Buyer to consult the city of Alhambra. Walking distance to the supermarkets, restaurants, shopping center, AMC. Property to be Sold as is . Dont miss the opportunity to own the cozy and warm home.

text: Nestled within a secure and gated community in Alhambra, this wonderful home offers a perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and style. Positioned at the back of the community, it boasts serene greenery views and an unparalleled sense of seclusion. As you step inside, you are greeted by soaring high ceilings that create an open and airy atmosphere. The living room is a cozy retreat with a new ceiling fan, a fireplace, and seamless access to a private patio-ideal for relaxation or entertaining. The remodeled kitchen features custom cabinets and countertops, combining modern functionality with timeless design. Adjacent to the kitchen, the dining room offers a dedicated space for meals, conveniently separated from the main living areas. A thoughtfully placed half bath on the main floor adds to the home's convenience. Upstairs, you'll find 3 generously sized bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The primary en-suite bedroom is a true sanctuary, with cathedral ceilings, a private balcony, and a beautifully updated bathroom featuring a luxurious soaking tub, a walk-in shower, and dual sinks. The second and third bedrooms share a spacious full bathroom with a skylight that bathes the space in natural light. Both bedrooms also enjoy access to a patio with stunning views of the lush greenery. Additional features include a skylight above the staircase, central air conditioning and heating, and a two-car garage with direct access to the home. The garage also provides washer and dryer hookups. Home also has ample attic storage space. This exceptional home is part of a fantastic gated community with convenient access to the 10 freeway, making commutes to Los Angeles a breeze. A rare find, it offers the perfect combination of privacy, modern updates, and prime location.

text: This property is perfect for owner and investor, this beautiful and well-maintained 3-unit multi-family residence with opportunities to add ADUs in the heart of Alhambra. This spacious property features 3 separated units totaling approximately 3, 074 square feet of living space. The first-floor unit offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms across approximately 1, 200 square feet. The second floor has two units, each approximately 900 square feet with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom ideal for generating rental income while the owner occupies one unit. The property includes four single-car garages and additional parking for four more vehicles. Ideally situated near Parks, shopping, restaurants, school, Cal State LA and just minutes away from Downtown Los Angeles, easy access to freeways 10 and 710 and public transportation. The large backyard offers potential to build an additional unit or ADU for additional rental income. Two units are currently occupied by long term tenants. This Property is being sold as-is condition. Seller will not make any repairs or offer credits.

With hard wood flooring throughout. Giving the home a warm and cohesive feel. Most of the interior was freshly repainted in 2021, and energy-efficient UPVC windows installed to help keep things quiet and comfortable. Enjoy modern upgrades like fully paid-off solar panels, a Tesla charger, and a Google Nest smart AC systemperfect for both convenience and energy savings. The roof is estimated to be less than 10 years old, offering peace of mind for years to come. The two-car garage provides plenty of space for storage or parking. One of the standout features is the large backyard. Complete with a mature orange tree and a jujube tree a serene outdoor space thats perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Property location very convivence for public dinning, park, church, and supermarket.

text: This Contemporary, Upscale Two-Story Condo is Located in the Highly Sought-After Gateway Walk Gated Community, Just Moments from Vibrant Downtown Alhambra. Positioned in a Tranquil Courtyard Setting, This Unit Boasts the Largest Floor Plan in the Complex, Featuring 3 Bedrooms and 2.5 Bathrooms. The Bright and Airy Living Room Flows Seamlessly into the Formal Dining Area. An Open-Concept Gourmet Kitchen, Complete with Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops, Recessed Lighting, and a Breakfast Bar Ideal for Casual Dining. Adjacent to the Kitchen, the Breakfast Nook is Enhanced by a Stylish Chandelier and Built-in Cabinetry. The Spacious Family Room Features Elegant Marble Flooring and Opens to a Private Balcony for Fresh Air. A Convenient Powder Room Completes the Main Level. Upstairs, the Expansive Primary Suite Offers a Generous Walk-in Closet and a Luxurious En-suite Bathroom with Dual Sinks, a Soaking Tub, and a Separate Shower. Two Well-sized Secondary Bedrooms Share a Hallway Bathroom. Additional Highlights Include Upstairs Hallway Built-in Cabinetry and a Desk area for Extra Storage and Workspace, as well as a Laundry Closet. Rich Mahogany Hardwood Flooring and Plantation Shutters add Refined Touch Throughout the Home. Central AC & Heating System, and A New Tankless Water Heater Provide Comfort and Efficiency. HOA Dues: $462/Month Including Trash, Fire & Earthquake Insurance, and Exterior Maintenance. Community Amenities Include a Fitness Center and Recreation Room, Beautifully Landscaped Courtyards with an Outdoor Fireplace, and BBQ areas. Secured Subterranean Parking with Two Assigned Spaces and Extra Storage Unit in the Garage. Ideally Located in the Heart of Alhambra, This home is Within Walking Distance to the Alhambra Place with Popular Restaurants & Shops, Public Library, Movie Theater and Sunday Farmers Market, Offering the perfect Blend of Luxury, Convenience, and Lifestyle. Easy Access to DTLA and Pasadena Old Town.

Each unit enjoys its own private entrance for added convenience and privacy.

text: Newly constructed and located in the heart of Alhambra. Located within minutes to So. Pasadena, San Marino and San Gabriel, The Langham Huntington in Pasadena, Lacy Park, Alhambra Golf Course and Mission District. Beautiful 2 Story Mediterranean style building with lush landscaping. As you walk up to this end unit, you walk in to a bright and beautiful open concept living room with kitchen, full bath and laundry area. Off the kitchen you have your own private patio area to enjoy a morning cup of coffee, etc and also leads out to the community area. As you walk up stairs you have a beautiful master suite with a private balcony and windows overlooking the foothill mountains. 2nd bedroom also with its private balcony. You also have a bonus room that can be perfect for a home office, play room etc and a full bath. This unit also offers its own private entrance from the 2 car garage and is the only units that offers this.

text: Rare 8-Unit Investment Opportunity in Prime Alhambra with Development Potential This exceptional multifamily property consists of two side-by-side parcels totaling 22, 978 square feet in the highly desirable Residential High Density (RH) zone of Alhambra. Featuring eight fully occupied units with a combined 6, 415 square feet of living space, this asset offers a diverse mix of rental options, including a studio, two 1-bed/1-bath duplexes, an upstairs two-bedroom unit, and two detached single-family homesone of which is a three-bedroom with a basement and private fenced yard. Most units are equipped with in-unit laundry, with the exception of the studio and the upstairs unit, which share a laundry room downstairs. The property includes ample on-site parking, featuring five standalone single-car garages, a two-car garage with an attached studio and upper unit, a carport, and additional off-alley and street parking. The buildings have been well-maintained, and all units are currently rented with no outstanding balances, reflecting strong tenant retention and minimal vacancies. Ideally situated near Pasadena, San Marino, and San Gabriel, this property offers easy access to major freeways, public transportation, top-rated restaurants, entertainment, Dodger Stadium, Hollywood, golf courses, Downtown Los Angeles, Santa Anita, The Rose Bowl, USC, UCLA, Cal State LA, and an array of retail shops and parks. With its prime RH zoning designation, this property allows for a density of 43 units per acre, a maximum building height of 45 feet, and up to five stories, presenting significant redevelopment potential (buyer to verify). There may also be opportunities to add ADUs or Junior ADUs for additional rental income. This is a rare chance to acquire a high-performing investment property with substantial upside in a prime infill location. Private property Do not enter without written permission.

text: Welcome to 83 E Commonwealth Ave #PH-C, a luxurious penthouse condo in the Gateway Walk Association located in the heart of downtown Alhambra. This top-floor unit offers 1, 310 square feet of elegant living space, featuring 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. Built in 2006, the condo boasts modern amenities and an open floor plan designed for comfort and style. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by soaring ceilings and abundant natural light streaming through large windows, creating an airy and inviting atmosphere. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances, perfect for culinary enthusiasts. The living and dining areas seamlessly connect, providing an ideal space for entertaining guests. The master suite offers a serene retreat with a well-appointed en-suite bathroom, while the second bedroom is equally spacious and versatile. Additional features include in-unit laundry, central air conditioning, and two assigned parking spaces in a secure, subterranean garage. Residents can enjoy community amenities such as a fitness center, landscaped courtyard, and a recreation room. The building is conveniently located near shopping centers, restaurants, and public transportation, offering both comfort and convenience.

text: Monterey Bay Square is an exclusive, brand new mixed-use community offering 62 luxurious residences in the vibrant heart of Alhambra. Designed with modern elegance and meticulous attention to detail, each penthouse home spans two spacious stories and features soaring ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the space with natural light, quartz countertops, and open floor plans perfect for both relaxing and entertaining. Penthouse units include an en-suite bedroom on the lower level and an en-suite bedroom upstairs, offering comfort and privacy throughout. This unit has two balconies with stunning views of the surrounding mountains and city skyline, while an additional secluded rooftop terrace provides a peaceful outdoor retreat facing the interior of the community. Residents of Monterey Bay Square enjoy unparalleled amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, an elegant resident lounge for social gatherings, and a beautifully landscaped terrace designed for outdoor relaxation. Located just minutes from Alhambra Squares premier dining, shopping, and cultural experiences, Monterey Bay Square offers the ideal blend of sophistication, comfort, and convenience. Schedule your private tour today and experience Monterey Bay Square in person!
