text: Welcome to this beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 2.5-bath South facing townhome located in a serene, resort-like Spanish Hacienda-style community. With double sliding doors that open to a charming patio, this home offers the feel and privacy of a single-family residence. Step into a bright and airy living room with soaring ceilings, seamlessly connected to a dining area and a sleek, modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, abundant cabinetry, and elegant Silestone quartz countertops. Newer Milgard EZ-open windows and patio doors, along with motorized shades controlled by a wireless remote, enhance both comfort and style. Additional highlights include a built-in central vacuum system and extra storage space in the attached garage. Enjoy the many HOA amenities such as lush landscaped grounds, a lap swimming pool with lounge chairs, tranquil courtyards with fountains, and a stylish clubhouse. Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined street, yet just minutes from the vibrant Alhambra Main Street with its array of restaurants, bakeries, shops, schools, and convenient transportation.

text: Monterey Bay Square is an exclusive, brand new mixed-use community offering 62 luxurious residences in the vibrant heart of Alhambra. Designed with modern elegance and meticulous attention to detail, each home features soaring ceilings, expansive windows that flood the space with natural light, and open floor plans perfect for both relaxing and entertaining. The interiors are enhanced by quartz countertops, high-end finishes, and private balconies that offer breathtaking views of both the surrounding mountains and city skyline. Residents of Monterey Bay Square enjoy unparalleled amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, an elegant resident lounge for social gatherings, and a beautifully landscaped terrace designed for outdoor relaxation. Located just minutes from Alhambra Squares premier dining, shopping, and cultural experiences, Monterey Bay Square offers the ideal blend of sophistication, comfort, and convenience. Schedule your private tour today and experience Monterey Bay Square in person!

text: Discover the charm of this unique property in Alhambras sought-after Main Street Collection, developed by City Ventures. This vibrant community offers 86 residences, including condos, shopkeeper flats, and 8, 200 square feet of prime commercial space home to popular spots like Chase Bank, Dessert Shops, and Cafe . Designed for energy efficiency, each unit benefits from solar power, substantially reducing utility costs. Unit 231 spans three levels and is one of just six units that include dedicated commercial space, adding flexibility for business or rental income. The first floor features a high-ceilinged, approximately 650-square-foot commercial area complete with its own entrance and bathroomperfect for an office, studio, or retail use, or as a separate leased space. The second floor offers a well-appointed bedroom with two large closets, a full bath, a stylish kitchen with stone countertops and stainless-steel appliances, a dining area with a balcony, and a convenient Stackable washer and dryer in the closet. The third floor is dedicated to a bright, expansive master suite with a family room, inviting plenty of natural light. Unit 231 also includes a secure, 2-car enclosed garage with a roller door and extra storage. Residents enjoy a shared courtyard and outdoor BBQ area, all within walking distance of banks, cafes, bakeries, restaurants, Alhambra High School, and City Hall. It's a perfect owner-use space for small business owners.

text: A fully remodeled townhouse features 3-bedroom and 2.5-bathroom, nestled in a sought-after North Alhambra neighborhood close to San Marino and South Pasadena, located in Alhambra Unified School District. On the inviting main level, a comfortable living room provides a cozy fireplace, ample cabinetry and closets. An updated kitchen with new custom cabinets, a brand-new island and stainless-steel appliances, opening to a formal dining area. A convenient half-bath completes this floor. Upstairs, primary bedroom suite, two secondary bedrooms share one bathroom. Tons of upgrades: new waterproof vinyl flooring throughout the home, newly renovated bathrooms, fresh interior painting, LED recessed lighting. Renewed staircase, dual pane windows and sliding doors, epoxy floor in garage. A private, enclosed deckyard and a spacious 2-car garage equipped with a laundry area. Low HOA fees that cover trash, water, and maintenance. Situated in the vibrant city of Alhambra, this property is close to schools, parks, shopping centers, gourmet restaurants, and easy commuting to DTLA. Dont miss the opportunity to claim this charming home yours!
